transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another.

approve.description: Approves a given address to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

push.description: Pushes a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

pull.description: Pulls a specified amount of tokens from a given address.

move.description: Moves a specified amount of tokens from one address to another without changing the approval.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a given address.

stopped.description: Returns whether the contract is stopped.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

setOwner.description: Sets a new owner of the contract.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's address.

setName.description: Sets the name of the token.
